title: #11 The Science Against Porn, Free Speech and Kurt Schlicter
description: This week on Louder With Crowder, we start off dealing with the news of the week.  Obama, ISIS, Rudy Giuliani and the like. But we also have a fascinating discussion with Gary Wilson, author of “Your Brain on Porn” as we discuss the physiological and cultural ramifications coming from a generation raised with online pornography. The data is staggering. You can watch our interview on the video-cast, or listen to it on the go with the full audio podcast below! We’re also joined by my friend Kurt Schlicter to discuss freedom of speech, the military and exercising as you get older!
itunes:author: Blaze Podcast Network
